summary: Diff adds core PWA assets (manifest, service worker, offline fallback page) and registers the service worker in the React app. However, the diff does not show the required icon PNG assets being added, and the README does not explicitly state that generating a Play Store .aab is out of scope. Additionally, project_state.json was modified with a React Native + Firebase/.aab-focused summary that conflicts with the BuildRequest constraints and was not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add required PWA icon assets to the frontend as static files and reference them from the web app manifest (do not serve icons via the backend).
missing_requirements.reason: The manifest references icons under /assets/generated, but the diff does not show the actual PNG icon files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated (or equivalent). Without the files present, the acceptance criteria for providing 192x192 and 512x512 icons is not met based on available evidence.
evidence: frontend/index.html (links to the same icon paths)

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a short in-repo README section explaining how to publicly share the deployed app URL and how to install it on Android as a PWA, explicitly noting that Play Store upload requires a separate Android build outside this project.
missing_requirements.reason: The added README includes production URL guidance and Android install steps, but it does not explicitly note that Play Store upload / generating an .aab requires a separate Android build outside this project (an explicit callout is required by the acceptance criteria).

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project metadata to describe rebuilding as a React Native + Firebase mobile app that can be packaged as an Android App Bundle (.aab) for Google Play Store release.
hallucinated_features.reason: This is not requested (the BuildRequest explicitly asks for PWA as an alternative to Play Store) and contradicts stated constraints/non-goals about not introducing React Native/Firebase or generating .aab files within this project.
evidence: project_state.json (summary mentions React Native + Firebase and .aab/Play Store release)

hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-13 specifically requests Android install steps (and production URL sharing + out-of-scope Play Store note). iOS instructions are extra scope not requested (though not harmful).
